item.description:
All are welcome to South Shore Living Food's first raw food potluck.

Please join us!

When: Sunday, November 21st from 2-5pm

Where: at the home of Dawn McGurn, 55 Paul Street in Braintree.

What to Bring: Please bring a raw food dish large enough to serve 6-8 people.

We'll be having a time of sharing ideas, trying new foods and spreading the word about healthy living! Come and have a good time.

Directions: From route 3, take exit 17 (Braintree rotary)... take the exit off the rotary towards Braintree/S. Braintree, slight left onto Ivory Street... Ivory Street becomes John W. Mahar Highway... follow to end, turn right onto Plain St... at lights (RR Tracks) turn left onto Washington St... Follow for 2 miles, turn left on Water St. Take 2nd left on Paul St. We are last house on right, #55 - a gray house. From 128, take exit 6 (route 37/South Shore Plaza). Follow 37 through 5 corners. Stay on 37. Turn right on Washington Street (route 37) at intersection with Dunkin' Donuts, Tiki Palace and railroad tracks. Follow for about two miles. Turn left on Water St. Take 2nd left on Paul St. We are the last house on right, #55. Hope to see you there!

Please RSVP to dawnmcgurn@gmail.com and let us know you can make it! Call with any questions - Dawn @ 781-843-5221 (home) or 617-417-6320 (cell)
item.name: Potluck: Braintree
